Text: haftman make sure that your mediaplayer supports .mkv-files :)
haftman: Make sure that the mediaplayer you are using supports .mkv-files.
It does, and I've been able to get sound on the other episodes of entourage (.mkv files). I don't get it. I can see the video, but no sound
Got it to work. Downloaded http://ffdshow-tryout.sourceforge.net/ and that did the trick. Strange that all other mkv's I have worked fine.
